con:request.name: Payment Create
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_1" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_1" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_1" xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:debtor:v2_1" xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:creditor:v2_1"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>PIN Create</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>V2.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#userid}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>INT</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgunit> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value4}" key="${Properties#item4}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentCreateRequest> <urn:paymentMessage> <urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn2:messageIdentification>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:messageIdentification> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:endToEndIdentification>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:endToEndIdentification> </urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn1:paymentInfo> <urn3:paymentMethod>TRF</urn3:paymentMethod> <!--Optional:--> <urn3:paymentTypeInformation> <!--Optional:--> <urn3:instructionPriority>NORM</urn3:instructionPriority> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn3:categoryPurpose>SUPP</urn3:categoryPurpose> </urn3:paymentTypeInformation> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn3:requestedExecutionDate>${Properties#ReqExnDate}</urn3:requestedExecutionDate> <urn3:debtorAccount> <urn2:identification>${Properties#debitAccount}</urn2:identification> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:currency>NOK</urn2:currency> </urn3:debtorAccount> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn3:debtor> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:id> <urn2:OrgId> <urn2:Id>4201</urn2:Id> </urn2:OrgId> </urn2:id> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:department>dep</urn2:department> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:subDepartment>subdep</urn2:subDepartment> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:streetName>1</urn2:streetName> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:buildingNumber>2</urn2:buildingNumber> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:postCode>443</urn2:postCode> <urn2:countrySubDivision>332</urn2:countrySubDivision> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:contactDetailsName>Name</urn2:contactDetailsName> </urn3:debtor> </urn1:paymentInfo> <urn1:transaction> <urn4:amount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:instructedAmount currency="NOK"> <urn2:amount>1</urn2:amount> </urn2:instructedAmount> </urn4:amount> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:exchangeRateInformation> <urn2:exchangeRate>1</urn2:exchangeRate> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:rateType>AGRD</urn2:rateType> <urn2:contractIdentification>14</urn2:contractIdentification> <!--Optional:--> </urn4:exchangeRateInformation> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:chargeBearer>DEBT</urn4:chargeBearer> <urn4:creditorAgent> <urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:department>dep</urn2:department> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:subDepartment>sudep</urn2:subDepartment> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:streetName>22</urn2:streetName> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:buildingNumber>2</urn2:buildingNumber> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:postCode>334</urn2:postCode> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:townName>town</urn2:townName> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:countrySubDivision>Sub</urn2:countrySubDivision> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn4:creditorAgent> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:creditor> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:id> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:OrgId> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:Id>4201</urn2:Id> </urn2:OrgId> </urn2:id> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:department>de</urn2:department> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:subDepartment>sude</urn2:subDepartment> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:streetName>44</urn2:streetName> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:buildingNumber>44</urn2:buildingNumber> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:postCode>345</urn2:postCode> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:townName>town</urn2:townName> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:countrySubDivision>SUbcountry</urn2:countrySubDivision> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:country>NO</urn2:country> <!--0 to 7 repetitions:--> </urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn4:creditor> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:creditorAccount> <urn2:identification>${Properties#intCreditAccount}</urn2:identification> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:currency>NOK</urn2:currency> </urn4:creditorAccount> <urn1:remittanceInformationUnstructured>Remittance</urn1:remittanceInformationUnstructured> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:transaction> <urn1:autoConfirm>DISABLED</urn1:autoConfirm> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:retailPaymentApprovalNeeded>true</urn1:retailPaymentApprovalNeeded> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:fundsCheckRetryDays>1</urn1:fundsCheckRetryDays> </urn:paymentMessage> </urn:PaymentCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Payment Confirm
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v2_1" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:payment-status-update:v2_1"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>PIN Create</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>V2.0</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${Properties#userid}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>INT</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgunit> <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/> <wsc:item value="${Properties#value4}" key="${Properties#item4}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentConfirmRequest> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 4 items at this level--> <urn:accountInput> <urn1:messageId>${Payment Create#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_1'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_1'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:messageId[1]}</urn1:messageId> <urn1:accountIdentification>${Properties#debitAccount}</urn1:accountIdentification> </urn:accountInput> </urn:PaymentConfirmRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: select TRANSACTIONSID, PAYMENTTYPE, PAYMENTSTATUS, HIDDEN, DEBETACCOUNTNO from TRANSACTIONS where TRANSACTIONSID = '${Payment Create#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_1'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_1'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}'
